tool_description: REALTIME! #1 Most Hated API by Bookmakers: Competitions, Matches, Odds & Arbitrage Bets for 170+ bookies. To name some bookies: bet365, betano, fanduel, pinnacle, bwin, boylesports, tipico, winbet, draftkings, betsson, stake, dafabet, ladbrokes ... and many more. Available sports: Football (Soccer), Basketball, Ice Hockey, American Football, Tennis, Handball, Volleyball, Baseball, Cricket, Darts, Boxing, MMA, Rugby, Snooker, Table Tennis, Waterpolo, Futsal, Aussie Rules, Field Hockey, Floorba...
name: ODDS-API
title: ODDS-API

api_list.name: Odds - (pre-game & live)
api_list.description:
Retrieves real-time Odds for the selected match filtered by your preferred bookmakers. Use the endpoint "Matches" first to get the correct input data for "matchid" and "bookmakers".
The more bookies you select the longer the request will take.

required_parameters.name: bookmakers
required_parameters.description: Preferred & available bookmakers (more than one: seperated by comma ( , ))

api_list.name: Valuebets Balanced Portfolio - (last trades)
api_list.description: This endpoint shows the data for a balanced live portfolio of all Valuebets. This is our Proof of Concept as the bankroll (assets_balanced) started at 1000 USD. Stake: (20$ / fair_odd). The endpoints "Valuebets (historical)" and "Odds (historical)" show deeper insights.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://odds-api1.p.rapidapi.com/portfolio/last-trades-balanced"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "odds-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://odds-api1.p.rapidapi.com/portfolio/last-trades-balanced"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Valuebets Portfolio - (html, works not in Rapid UI)
api_list.description:
Note: This endpoint can not be shown in RapidAPI as it is html.
This endpoint (locally/in the browser) shows a live portfolio of all Valuebets. The data for the chart is available under the "Valuebets Portfolio - (last trades)" endpoint.

api_list.name: Valuebets Portfolio - (last trades)
api_list.description:
This endpoint shows the data for a live portfolio of all Valuebets. This is our Proof of Concept as the bankroll (assets) started at 1000 USD. Stake=0.5% of bankroll.
The endpoints "Valuebets (historical)" and "Odds (historical)" show deeper insights.

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "odds-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Valuebets
api_list.description: To find Valuebets the Odds-endpoint should be requested with at least 20 bookmakers. This is a collection of all requested Odds. The more Users this API gets the more Valuebets will be found.

api_list.name: Surebets
api_list.description: To find Surebets the Odds-endpoint should be requested with at least 2 bookmakers. This is a collection of all requested Odds. The more Users this API gets the more Surebets will be found.

api_list.name: Odds (historical)
api_list.description: Retrieves historical Odds for the selected match. Use the endpoint "Matches (historical)" first to get the correct input data for "matchid".

api_list.name: Competitions
api_list.description:
Retrieves all competitions in our system for the selected sport.
Remember to use the received credentials of each competition for the endpoint "Matches".

api_list.name: Matches - (may take time)
api_list.description:
Retrieves all Matches in our system with available Bookmakers for each match. As this endpoint is on demand, the first request of the day for the selected competition may take up to 30 seconds. 
Use "matchid" and "bookies" for the endpoint "Odds".

required_parameters.name: match_urls
required_parameters.description: Links to each match by available bookmaker (true or false)

api_list.name: Valuebets (historical)
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a comprehensive list of all triggered Valuebets, bridging the gap between historical Odds and the most recent transactions of the Valuebet Portfolio, ensuring transparency.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://odds-api1.p.rapidapi.com/historical/valuebets"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "odds-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Matches (historical)
api_list.description:
Retrieves all historical Matches in our system. Take the endpoint "Competitions" as a reference for the input.
Use "matchid" for the endpoint "Odds (historical)".
